code: export var CoinList=function CoinList(currentPage){return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/markets?vs_currency=usd&order=market_cap_desc&per_page=100&page=".concat(currentPage,"&sparkline=false&locale=en");};export var TickerList=function TickerList(){return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/markets?vs_currency=usd&order=market_cap_desc&per_page=10&page=1&sparkline=false&locale=en";};export var SingleCoin=function SingleCoin(id){return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/".concat(id);};export var HistoricalChart=function HistoricalChart(id){var days=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:365;var currency=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'usd';return"https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/".concat(id,"/market_chart?vs_currency=").concat(currency,"&days=").concat(days);};
